participant_1.background:
I am recovering from knee surgery and trying not to lust after the neighbour pool boy.
I am a person who likes to express myself through tattoos and music.
I have a busy life and tend to neglect my family, but I'm making an effort to do better.
I'm retired and enjoy spending time with my black lab.
I enjoy painting, but I could never be a painter if I were blind.

participant_2.background:
I spend time with my family and try to remember all the good times we've had.
i was once offered to play basketball professionally.
I want to quit skiing, but I'm afraid of disappointing my parents.
i currently work in an office job.
my car is green and smells weird.

content.text: Hi! What are you up to today?
Hi! Not much. Just hanging out at home. You?
I'm recovering from knee surgery and trying not to lust after the neighbor pool boy!
Oh no! How did you hurt your knee?
I fell off my bike. It was a long fall and I'm really lucky it wasn't worse.
Wow, that sounds scary. I'm glad you're okay!
Thanks! I'm just glad I can still walk.
That's great news! So what do you like to do for fun?
I love to paint and I like to spend time with my black lab.
That sounds really nice. I love to ski, but I'm afraid I'm going to quit because I'm afraid of disappointing my parents.
Oh no! Why are you afraid of disappointing your parents?
They're really big fans of skiing and I don't want to let them down.
I understand. But you shouldn't do something you don't want to do just to please someone else.
You're right. I should just do what I want to do.
That's the spirit! So what do you want to do with your life?
I'm not sure. I've been thinking about going back to school to study business.
That sounds like a great idea! I'm sure you'd be great at it.
